Introducing the totally redesigned MyBell app. With a fresh new look and easier navigation tailored to Apple devices, it's never been easier to manage your Bell services.
Introducing the totally redesigned MyBell app. With a fresh new look and easier navigation tailored to Apple devices, it's never been easier to manage your Bell services.
Introducing the totally redesigned MyBell app. With a fresh new look and easier navigation tailored to Apple devices, it's never been easier to manage your Bell services.
Introducing the totally redesigned MyBell app. With a fresh new look and easier navigation tailored to Apple devices, it's never been easier to manage your Bell services.

This update adds these helpful new features:
- Change your Mobility rate plan and have changes take effect immediately or next bill cycle
- Get real-time mobile data usage information (updated every 15 minutes)
- Update the PIN you use to identify yourself quickly and securely when calling Bell

Introduces support for Touch ID and Face ID, so you can log in using fingerprint or face recognition.
• Various bug fixes
New: upgrade your Bell Mobility device directly in the app. Upgrading is easy, and we’ll ship your new device free of charge.
Improved experience
Improved experience
Improved experience
We’ve fixed bugs and made improvements to make your app experience better.

Bell Mobility device upgrades
• An improved browsing experience makes it easier to check out brands and devices
• Enhanced filters help you choose the perfect monthly rate plan
• It’s now easier to stay logged in to MyBell
• We’ve made it simpler to reboot your modem with the app
Do you have a suggestion or idea? Are you experiencing issues? Let us know at MyBellAppSupport@bell.ca. You can also rate the app and leave a review.

We’ve fixed bugs and made improvements to make your experience better.

New appointment feature:
• Manage and track your installation appointments for Bell Internet, TV and Home phone
• Reschedule appointments
• Provide visit instructions to technicians
• Submit feedback on a technician visit

Opt in to receive personalized push notifications.

Our latest update includes these helpful features:
- See and take advantage of personalized offers based on your customer profile
- Easily add a new line to your account when you’re upgrading to a new device
We’ve fixed bugs and made improvements to make your experience better.

Introducing these new helpful features:

- Order Wi-Fi Pods through the app
- Take advantage of personalized TV offers based on your customer profile
- Track unlimited data usage more easily with a new usage display
